title: Sweet Tare (Seasoning Sauce)
directions: Combine the soy sauce, mirin, sake, honey, and sugar in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
Simmer for 2 minutes, then remove from the heat and stir in the dashi.
Allow to cool to room temperature and store for up to 4 days in the fridge.
